App MDaemon

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


App MDaemon

Overview

Template for Mdaemon russian version.

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

There are no discovery rules in this template.
